__e: She came to me, I want you to know.
And remember, you came here for my help.
Well, she wouldn't speak to me then, but she has since sought me out and asked me to deliver this letter into your hands.
Why'd you cross half the world to find me?
Did you go see my cousin Melvin like I asked you to in my letter?
Why didn't you just go find her in person?
I found her and told her I'd been raped.
I sent for her so give her five minutes, okay?
It didn't really work out last time I saw her.
I knew that if I approached you, I'd have to see Fred, and I couldn't do that.
Well, look, uh, it's just that, I know she... I know she came, and... and got... got to you, and she's just trying to get between us, man, so that she can take what's rightfully mine.
When I came to your doorstep, for the second time in my life, I thought that I could find a home here, that this is where I really belong.
I found I was with child. I went to see him after you´d been born.
You know why we went to him? I was hoping he could find one good reason for me not to leave you. I don't have one anymore.
I mean, my dad left my mom when I was three, and I tracked him down about a year ago.
